channel.title: Is there a way to make a duel whip?
channel.description:
Hey,
I want to make a Duel whip, But i dont know if thats possible to make with the same current Whip Model
Because if make a duplicated whip and put it in the Shield slot, it shows it as wieldign a weapon.
So is there a way i could change this with some itemdef shit? Or do i need some other Models?

item.title: Is there a way to make a duel whip?
item.dc:creator: @Creative_I Creative I
item.description:
@Creative_I wrote:

[quote=“Lastdivine, post:1, topic:481747”]Hey,

I want to make a Duel whip,
But i dont know if thats possible to make with the same current Whip Model

Because if make a duplicated whip and put it in the Shield slot, it shows it as wieldign a weapon.

So is there a way i could change this with some itemdef shit?
Or do i need some other Models?[/quote]

Under the RS2 client section, there is a forum called “Models” and there should be another one on the top once you click on that, that says “Request Models”. Just Request it there, and someone will help you with the models/ints.

Read full topic
item.source: Is there a way to make a duel whip?

item.title: Is there a way to make a duel whip?
item.dc:creator: @Dan0194 Dan0194
item.description:
@Dan0194 wrote:

Yes it is possible you just have to alter a few things.

Read full topic
